price: Thamudi na A'di waliukadhibisha Msiba unao situsha.
footnotes: Kina Thamudi na kina A'di walikanusha Kiyama kinacho wagutua walimwengu wote kwa kitisho chake na shida zake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
